Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-27534 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-27534 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-12, affected by CVE-2023-27534
